verses.arabic: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing
verses.transliteration: Waz-zaariyaati zarwaa

verses.arabic: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]
verses.transliteration: Falhaamilaati wiqraa

verses.arabic: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: And those [ships] sailing with ease
verses.transliteration: Faljaariyaati yusraa

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,
verses.transliteration: Falmuqassimaati amraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
verses.transliteration: Innamaa too'adoona la-saadiq

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
verses.transliteration: Wa innad deena la waaqi'

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the heaven containing pathways,
verses.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i zaatil hubuk

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, you are in differing speech.
verses.transliteration: Innakum lafee qawlim mukhtalif

verses.arabic: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.arabicSimple: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.
verses.transliteration: Yu'faku 'anhu man ufik

verses.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.translation: Destroyed are the falsifiers
verses.transliteration: Qutilal kharraasoon

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.
verses.transliteration: Allazeena hum fee ghamratin saahoon

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.arabicSimple: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"
verses.transliteration: Yas'aloona ayyaana yawmud Deen

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire
verses.transliteration: Yawma hum 'alan naari yuftanoon

verses.arabic: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
verses.transliteration: Zooqoo fitnatakum haa zal lazee kuntum bihee tas ta'jiloon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,
verses.transliteration: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.
verses.transliteration: Aakhizeena maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanoo qabla zaalika muhsineen

segments.translation: Taking what their Lord has given them their Lord has given them
Indeed, they were before that good-doers

verses.arabic: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They used to sleep but little of the night,
verses.transliteration: kaanoo qaleelam minal laili maa yahja'oon

verses.arabic: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,
verses.transliteration: Wa bilashaari hum yastaghfiroon

words.translation: And in the hours before dawn

verses.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.
verses.transliteration: Wa feee amwaalihim haqqul lissaaa'ili walmahroom

verses.arabic: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]
verses.transliteration: Wa fil ardi aayaatul lilmooqineen

verses.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?
verses.transliteration: Wa feee anfusikum; afalaa tubsiroon

verses.arabic: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
verses.transliteration: Wa fissamaaa'i rizqukum wa maa too'adoon

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.
verses.transliteration: Fawa Rabbis samaaa'i wal ardi innahoo lahaqqum misla maa annakum tantiqoon

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -
verses.transliteration: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen

verses.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.
verses.transliteration: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun qawmum munkaroon

segments.translation: When they entered upon him and said Peace
He said Peace a people unknown

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
verses.transliteration: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihee fajaaa'a bi'ijlin sameen

verses.arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
verses.transliteration: Faqarrabahooo ilaihim qaala alaa taakuloon

verses.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.
verses.transliteration: Fa awjasa minhm khee fatan qaaloo laa takhaf wa bashsharoohu bighulaamin 'aleem

segments.translation: Then he felt from them a fear
and they gave him glad tidings of a son learned

words.translation: and they gave him glad tidings

verses.arabic: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"
verses.transliteration: Fa aqbalatim ra-atuhoo fee sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa wa qaalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki innahoo huwal hakeemul 'aleem

segments.translation: They said Thus said your Lord
Indeed, He [He] is the All-Wise the All-Knower

verses.arabic: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa khatbukum ayyuhal mursaloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen

verses.arabic: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: To send down upon them stones of clay,
verses.transliteration: Linursila 'alaihim hijaa ratam min teen

verses.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."
verses.transliteration: Musawwamatan 'inda rabbika lilmusrifeen

verses.arabic: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
verses.transliteration: Fa akhrajnaa man kaana feehaa minal mu'mineen

verses.arabic: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.
verses.transliteration: Famaa wajadnaa feehaa ghaira baitim minal muslimeen

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
verses.transliteration: Wa taraknaa feehaaa aayatal lillazeena yakhaafoonal 'azaabal aleem

verses.arabic: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
verses.transliteration: Wa fee Moosaaa iz arsalnaahu ilaa Fir'wna bisultaa nim mubeen

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."
verses.transliteration: Fatawalla biruknihee wa qaala saahirun aw majnoon

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.
verses.transliteration: Fa akhaznaahu wa junoo dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi wa huwa muleem

verses.arabic: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.
verses.transliteration: Wa fee 'Aadin iz arsalnaa 'alaihimur reehal'aqeem

verses.arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.
verses.transliteration: Maa tazaru min shai'in atat 'alaihi illaa ja'alat hu karrameem

verses.arabic: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."
verses.transliteration: Wa fee Samooda iz qeela lahum tamatta''oo hattaa heen

verses.arabic: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.
verses.transliteration: Fa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim fa akhazal humus saa'iqatu wa hum yanzuroon

verses.arabic: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
verses.transliteration: Famas tataa'oo min qiyaaminw wa maa kaanoo muntasireen

verses.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
verses.transliteration: Wa qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaano qawman faasiqeen

segments.translation: And the people of Nuh before before
indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
verses.transliteration: Wassamaaa'a banainaa haa bi aydinw wa innaa lamoosi'oon

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
verses.transliteration: Wal arda farashnaahaa fani'mal maahidoon

verses.arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.
verses.transliteration: Wa min kulli shai'in khalaqnaa zawjaini la'allakum tazakkaroon

verses.arabic: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
verses.transliteration: Fafirrooo ilal laahi innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen

segments.translation: indeed, I am to you from Him a warner clear

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa taj'aloo ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen

segments.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ
segments.translation: And do not make with Allah god another
segments.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa l-lahi ilāhan ākhara

segments.translation: Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner clear

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.arabicSimple: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika maaa atal lazeena min qablihim mir Rasoolin illaa qaaloo saahirun aw majnoon

verses.arabic: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.
verses.transliteration: Atawaasaw bih; bal hum qawmun taaghoon

words.translation: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.
verses.transliteration: Fatawalla 'anhum famaaa anta bimaloom

verses.arabic: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.
verses.transliteration: Wa zakkir fa innaz zikraa tanfa'ul mu'mineen

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqtul jinna wal insa illaa liya'budoon

verses.arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.
verses.transliteration: Maaa ureedu minhum mir rizqinw wa maaa ureedu anyyut'imoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.
verses.transliteration: Innal laaha Huwar Razzaaqu Zul Quwwatil Mateen

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.
verses.transliteration: Fa inna lillazeena zalamoo zanoobam misla zanoobi ashaabihim falaa yasta'jiloon

words.translation: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.
verses.transliteration: Fawailul lillazeena kafaroo miny yawmihimul lazee yoo'adoon
